DOC.brief_title: A Safety Effectiveness Study Acetaminophen ( 4000 mg/Day ) Naproxen ( 750 mg/Day ) Treatment Osteoarthritis Hip Knee
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind study compare long term safety profile effectiveness acetaminophen , give dose 1000 mg every four six hour , naproxen , give dose 375 mg twice daily ( match placebo give four time daily maintain blind ) , treatment osteoarthritis hip knee . There two group subject . Group 1 approximately 480 subject randomize treatment duration 12 month . Group 2 approximately 80 subject randomize treatment duration 6 month . The primary measure efficacy change baseline WOMAC Osteoarthritis Index pain subscale month 6 . Safety evaluation , throughout course study , include monitor adverse event , laboratory test assessments vital sign include respiration rate , pulse , blood pressure , body weight . Subjects instruct take dose medication orally , every 4-6 hour . The acetaminophen subject take total daily dose 4 g acetaminophen . The naproxen subject total daily dose 750 mg naproxen . The treatment duration 12 6 month Group 1 Group 2 , respectively .
